title: Can I get season rewards with lvl 0 honor?
body: I got a 25 game chat ban around 2 months ago and still no progress to lvl 1. Is it possible for me to get season rewards?

replies.body: AFAIK, honor ranks will be tied to separate end of season honor rewards. You should still be able to get the rank rewards as long as you don't get another ban of seven days or more from here on out! Also be sure to check out the other requirements [**right over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068).
This is the most useful thing a Rioter has ever said about the honor system since it's debut!!!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aRXqZz3R,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-08T01:25:31.800+0000)
>
> AFAIK, honor ranks will be tied to separate end of season honor rewards. You should still be able to get the rank rewards as long as you don't get another ban of seven days or more from here on out! Also be sure to check out the other requirements [**right over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068).

So since i got a 25 game chat restrict I am fine? If just chill and learn how to control my temper

> [{quoted}](name=Frostwolfs Blood,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aRXqZz3R,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-09-08T16:02:15.888+0000)
>
> So since i got a 25 game chat restrict I am fine?

Supposedly, you'll unlock extra honor rewards for being honorable at the end of the season. You won't get those if you're dishonorable. But I'm assuming you're referring to things such as skins and borders for obtaining certain ranks, correct? You will probably still get those.

> [{quoted}](name=Kokua,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aRXqZz3R,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-07T12:16:58.272+0000)
>
> Supposedly, you'll unlock extra honor rewards for being honorable at the end of the season. You won't get those if you're dishonorable. But I'm assuming you're referring to things such as skins and borders for obtaining certain ranks, correct? You will probably still get those.

Thank the lord I worked so hard to get Diamond on my first account.  I let it loose after a team just kept flaming me and Ik i was stupid. But thank you for the answer I only care about the border!
